error TS5107: Option 'module=System' is deprecated and will stop functioning in TypeScript 7.0. Specify compilerOption '"ignoreDeprecations": "6.0"' to silence this error.
commentsOnJSXExpressionsArePreserved.tsx(5,16): error TS7026: JSX element implicitly has type 'any' because no interface 'JSX.IntrinsicElements' exists.
commentsOnJSXExpressionsArePreserved.tsx(18,9): error TS7026: JSX element implicitly has type 'any' because no interface 'JSX.IntrinsicElements' exists.


!!! error TS5107: Option 'module=System' is deprecated and will stop functioning in TypeScript 7.0. Specify compilerOption '"ignoreDeprecations": "6.0"' to silence this error.
